I don't know if its just me but season 3 has no sound.Season 1,2 worked great.anyway thanks for all the great uploads. I appreciate it.

I used the original audio from YouTube FLV files for season 3. It works on my comp (tested with VLC, Media Player Classic, iTunes, and QuickTime), PS3 (streaming and via USB), and on a cheap little portable media player, so figured it wouldn't be an issue.

But there appears to be an issue as when I try to convert the audio track to any other format it bogs down the encoder and shows a VERY small file size (750 KB) for the output file. Hmmm. 

Might be on to something at the moment for a fix, but if what I'm doing is what it takes to make it work, it's not going to be a really simple easy quick fix. Well, it can be, depending on ones own technical PC skills. ;)
